text:
Apache warns me of already loaded modules, initializes the network (I know this 
because upon doing netstat -a it reports 127.0.0.1:http LISTENING) but after 
about five minutes fails with a VC++ Runtime error "Priviledged Instruction"

I'm not sure whether it's a fault in my apache, mod_perl, mod_ssl, or php
creator: matt@triberyllium.uni.cc
wrowe@apache.org
text:
If you grab the apache_2.0.45-win32-x86-symbols.zip package from the binary
  distribution, unpack it into your c:\program files\Apache2\ directory tree
  (remember to unzip the -dir ectories as well) you will possibly get a more
  useful report from Dr. Watson, including what module caused the error.

creator: manoj@apache.org
text: Closed due to lack of response
